EmailTemplate.description: This is send to Staffing Associate record owner when no medical info has been submitted
EmailTemplate.name: SF to Staffing Associate medical info call needed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} has not submitted medical or dietary info
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.OwnerFirstName},
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} has not yet submitted their dietary and medical information. Please follow up with a call. Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}.
This is a standard email, sent automatically when a candidate has not submitted their medical information.
